# braintrustdata_roles (Data Source)

Lists Braintrust roles using API-native filters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List roles with API-native filters
data "braintrustdata_roles" "all" {
  limit = 50
}

# Filter roles by exact name
data "braintrustdata_roles" "filtered" {
  role_name = "admin"
  org_name  = "example-org"
}

output "all_role_ids" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_roles.all.ids
}

output "filtered_roles" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_roles.filtered.roles
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `ending_before` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch roles before this ID.
- `limit` (Number) Optional max number of roles to return.
- `org_name` (String) Optional organization name filter.
- `role_name` (String) Optional exact role name filter.
- `starting_after` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch roles after this ID.

### Read-Only

- `ids` (List of String) List of returned role IDs.
- `roles` (Attributes List) List of roles. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--roles))

<a id="nestedatt--roles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `roles`

Read-Only:

- `created` (String) The timestamp when the role was created.
- `description` (String) A description of the role.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the role.
- `member_permissions` (List of String) List of permissions assigned to members of this role.
- `member_roles` (List of String) List of role IDs assigned to members of this role.
- `name` (String) The name of the role.
- `org_id` (String) The organization ID that the role belongs to.
- `user_id` (String) The ID of the user who created the role.
